document_data.name: Bedi
document_data.mainbody:
'''Bedi''' was a [[half-orc]] [[barbarian]] worshiper of [[the Absolute]] and a guide, stationed in the [[Moonrise Towers]] during the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].

{{Quote|Stay sharp. These shadows can sneak up on you.|Bedi}}
document_data.Description: Bedi was a half-orcish man with muscled body and a hide of muddy green. He had a gruff and rude personality, often voicing his disrespect for General [[Ketheric Thorm|Thorm]].
document_data.History: In the {{YearlinkName|1492}}, Bedi was among those who joined the new religion that sprang in the [[Western Heartlands]]. He was stationed within the Moonrise Towers – the fortress controlled by the Absolute's warlord – Ketheric Thorm. Bedi was among relative new additions to the [[Cult of the Absolute]]'s guides that helped pilgrims reach the Moonrise Towers amidst the deadly [[shadow-cursed lands]].
